name: Admin Console Release 25.3.0
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you a few new features and some improvements, see below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

ADDED.text: Validation for App Name in Federated SSO configuration in the Admin Console.
Ability to share the customerâ€™s profile URL with the team members within the Admin Console.

IMPROVED.text: Updated JWT configuration UI with default values, e.g., email mapping, Default expiration time, etc. in the JWT configuration in the Admin Console.
